features.title: Complete note editor with rich text options

accordions.title: Create and Save your notes with multi-media
accordions.content: Images, videos, PDFs and audio files are supported. Create math expressions and diagrams directly from the app. Take photos with the mobile app and save them to a note.

accordions.title: Web Clipper Extension
accordions.content: Images, videos, PDFs and audio files are supported. Create math expressions and diagrams directly from the app. Take photos with the mobile app and save them to a note.

accordions.title: Protect your note with lock
accordions.content: Images, videos, PDFs and audio files are supported. Create math expressions and diagrams directly from the app. Take photos with the mobile app and save them to a note.

thirdFeatures.title: Easy to switch between light and dark mode
